Plot tsibble

Source: R/fn_plot.R
plot_tsibble.Rd

plot_tsibble() is a Plot function that plots data. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to plot tsibble. The function returns Plot (an output object of multiple potential types).

Usage

plot_tsibble(
  series_tsb,
  auto_1L_lgl = TRUE,
  date_tfmn_fn = NULL,
  facet_1L_lgl = F,
  fiscal_start_1L_int = 7L,
  frequency_1L_chr = c("daily", "weekly", "monthly", "quarterly", "yearly", "fiscal",
    "sub"),
  key_totals_ls = NULL,
  key_vars_chr = character(0),
  metrics_chr = make_metric_vars(),
  prefix_1L_chr = "Cumulative",
  transform_1L_lgl = TRUE,
  type_1L_chr = c("main", "cumulative"),
  what_1L_chr = character(0)
)

Arguments

series_tsb

Series (a tsibble)

auto_1L_lgl

Automatic (a logical vector of length one), Default: TRUE

date_tfmn_fn

Date transformation (a function), Default: NULL

facet_1L_lgl

Facet (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

fiscal_start_1L_int

Fiscal start (an integer vector of length one), Default: 7

frequency_1L_chr

Frequency (a character vector of length one), Default: c("daily", "weekly", "monthly", "quarterly", "yearly", "fiscal", "sub")

key_totals_ls

Key totals (a list), Default: NULL

key_vars_chr

Key variables (a character vector), Default: character(0)

metrics_chr

Metrics (a character vector), Default: make_metric_vars()

prefix_1L_chr

Prefix (a character vector of length one), Default: 'Cumulative'

transform_1L_lgl

Transform (a logical vector of length one), Default: TRUE

type_1L_chr

Type (a character vector of length one), Default: c("main", "cumulative")

what_1L_chr

What (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

Value

Plot (an output object of multiple potential types)
